title: Workshop on Flexible Learning Design (FLeD Tool) for Improving Accessibility and Inclusivity in Higher Education

context.additional_context: Participatory educational environments considering multicultural and multi-age learner characteristics

learning_goals: Design educational scenarios applying at least three Universal Design for Learning (UDL) principles using the FLeD tool
Propose at least two accessibility support strategies for disability types in simulation/VR environments
Submit inclusive instructional design project outcomes through collaboration

resources: Access to FLeD Tool web-based platform
VR headset and assistive technology devices (e.g., screen readers)
UDL (Universal Design for Learning) guidelines workbook

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
